title: What are some good musical films in Bengali? - Quora

response.answer_text: OK. Good one. So start with Meghe Dhaka Taara, 1960 by Ritwik GhatakBaishe Shrabon, 2011 by Srijit MukherjiSathi,2002 by Haranath ChakrabortyJaatiswar,2014 by Srijit MukherjiAmi Aasbo Fire, 2018 by Anjan DuttSaheb Bibi Golam ,2016 by Pratim D. GuptaHope you’ll enjoy. Thanks :)
